desc: Since we first created the swivel sliding transfer bench, we have perfected our multi-functioning benches over the decades. With over 30 different high weight capacity bench/chairs, from sliding to tub mounts to swivel shower chairs, we've got you covered for any potential safety and comfort need.

layout.text: OUR SLIDING TRANSFER BENCHES ARE INNOVATIVE, SAFE, EASY-TO-ASSEMBLE, AND USER-FRIENDLY
